title: Legend of a poro king 2015

replies.body: theres 5 available icons one costs like 1500 ip which isnt a lot rly considering most others cost rp. the other 4 u get for free if a friend gifts u one and they only cost 100ip to send so just get a friend to send one
Don't think so, something like that sounds like it would have been mentioned on the promotion page.
